overview: Connie is a widow and mother whose work involves checking up on the competition for her department store employer.  When Steve, a charming salesman at a competing store, recognizes her true motives but refuses to expose her, he ends up getting fired as a result.  Feeling guilty, Connie agrees to buy lunch for Steve, striking up a friendship that complicates her relationship with Carl, a lawyer who wants to marry her.
tagline: A Heartwarming Holiday Tale Filled with Romance and Surprises
title: Holiday Affair
